formalpara.title: Figure 5. Variant staining with antibodies against C. elegans P granules.
formalpara.para: a, C. elegans, 2-cell stage, P granules are only present in the germline cell P1; b, A. nanus, 2-cell stage, strong perinuclear staining in the germline cell P1, weak staining in the somatic AB cell; c, Rhabditis terricola. 8-cell stage, intranuclear staining in all blastomeres. Orientation: anterior, left. Scale bar, 10 μm.
